name: Otterly Rad
body:
### Welcome to Otterly Rad!
We're a collection of podcasts (well, OK, one podcast at the moment) that can be accessed [here](http://www.soundcloud.com/otterlyrad). Our titular podcast covers interesting topics, products, and services for kids, caretakers, and families of all shapes, sizes, and kinds.

### Get in Touch with Us!
For best results, tweet us [@otterlyrad](http://www.twitter.com/otterlyrad) or catch us individually ([Nathan](http://www.twitter.com/justnathan) and [Hayley](http://www.twitter.com/weehermione).) You can also leave us a comment on [Soundcloud](http://www.soundcloud.com/otterlyrad) and rate and review us on ITunes!

![Logo](http://i1.sndcdn.com/avatars-000190479751-g68ljt-t500x500.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
